subject: Broken plate (throttle)
description_text:
Hi!
My name is Albert, i am from Spain.
I bought a Plus X 3 pedal set from your official store in aliexpress (order
number 3060943171092104). Today i have installed it and everything was fine
but i have heard a noise and after looking at the pedal i have seen that
the plate that holds the little spring has broken in 2 parts.
How can i solve it? I have a race in a few days in my local club and the
pedal doesnt work well. Can you help me?
I attach some pictures.
Many thanks in advance.

conversations.body_text: Hi Albert Farres,    We will send you a replacement throttle pedal with the improved design today. When the blue limiter is adjusted to the minimum position, it may cause a collision that could damage the anti-interference plastic spring clip component.
Hi Albert Farres,  Your order has been shipped. The logistics number is:YT2526800703102271. You can track it at this website https://www.17track.net/zh-cn.

Good morning!
Nice, this is a really good service from you!
Just a few questions:
- I bought the pedalset in black, the pedal you have sent is black too?
- I noticed that the clutch pedal shares design with throttle pedal. Will i
have problem with it if I adjust the travel? By now i have not used it but
i will buy a H shifter in a few days.
- Do you know any other possible issue i can suffer in the future with my
pedals model?
Many thanks again :)
Albert

El jue, 25 sept 2025, 4:55, support@simsonn.com

Hi Albert Farres,  We will send you the black one as a replacement. In addition, the clutch is usually not set with such a short travel. We’ve also included the improved plastic clutch plate, so if it gets damaged, you can easily replace it yourself.

That's great, thank you very much.
Hope it arrives as soon as possible.
Best regards!

El jue, 25 sept 2025, 9:51, support@simsonn.com
